summary:
This is just a small tweak that makes salt piles have 0 weight.
This should be compatible with all other mods so long as they don't tweak salt piles, but if you load this after said other mods, it should still work.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a small tweak that makes salt piles have 0 weight. 
This should be compatible with all other mods so long as they don't tweak salt piles, but if you load this after said other mods, it should still work.

I personally use this with [ More Salt by szilellis ]: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=87735562

Cheerybelle's Micromods Nexus: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/8170278/?tb=mods][u]https://www.nexusmods.com/users/8170278?tab=user+files&BH=1[/u][/url]
Cheerybelle's Micromods Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=242267049
Cheerybelle's Micromods Drive: https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B6UjCHs3ScP9YU9BbWhvOC1fVWM&usp=sharing

Ported to Special Edition as an all-in-one single-ESP compilation: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/10445/?
author: Cheerybelle
